Structs/Extend.html#/s:10ServiceKit6Exte.name: get(_:default:)
Structs/Extend.html#/s:10ServiceKit6Exte.abstract: Gets a value from the Extend storage falling back to the default value if it does not exist

Structs/Extend.html#/s:10ServiceKit6Exte.name: get(_:default:)
Structs/Extend.html#/s:10ServiceKit6Exte.abstract: Gets a value from the Extend storage falling back to the default value if it does not exist

Structs/Extend.html#/s:10ServiceKit6Exte.name: subscript(_:)
Structs/Extend.html#/s:10ServiceKit6Exte.abstract: Allow subscripting by String key. This is a type-erased alternative to

Structs/Services.html#/s:10ServiceKit8Se.name: instance(_:)
Structs/Services.html#/s:10ServiceKit8Se.abstract: Registers a pre-initialized instance of a Service conforming to a single interface to the Services.

Structs/Services.html#/s:10ServiceKit8Se.name: instance(_:_:)
Structs/Services.html#/s:10ServiceKit8Se.abstract: Registers a pre-initialized instance of a Service conforming to a single interface to the Services.

Structs/Services.html#/s:10ServiceKit8Se.name: singleton(_:_:)
Structs/Services.html#/s:10ServiceKit8Se.abstract: Registers a new singleton service. Singleton services are created only once per container.

Structs/Services.html#/s:10ServiceKit8Se.name: register(_:_:)
Structs/Services.html#/s:10ServiceKit8Se.abstract: Registers a Service creating closure (service factory) conforming to a single interface to the Services.

Structs/Services.html#/s:10ServiceKit8Se.name: provider(_:)
Structs/Services.html#/s:10ServiceKit8Se.abstract: Registers a Provider to the services. This will automatically register all of the Provider‘s available

Structs/Services.html#/s:10ServiceKit8Se.name: extend(_:_:)
Structs/Services.html#/s:10ServiceKit8Se.abstract: Adds a supplement closure for the given Service type

Structs/Environment/Process.html#/s:10Se.name: subscript(dynamicMember:)
Structs/Environment/Process.html#/s:10Se.abstract: Gets a variable’s value from the process’ environment, and converts it to generic type T.

Structs/Environment/Process.html#/s:10Se.name: subscript(dynamicMember:)
Structs/Environment/Process.html#/s:10Se.abstract: Gets a variable’s value from the process’ environment as a String.

Structs/Environment.html#/s:10ServiceKit.name: production
Structs/Environment.html#/s:10ServiceKit.abstract: An environment for deploying your application to consumers.

Structs/Environment.html#/s:10ServiceKit.name: get(_:)
Structs/Environment.html#/s:10ServiceKit.abstract: Gets a key from the process environment

Structs/Environment.html#/s:10ServiceKit.name: isRelease
Structs/Environment.html#/s:10ServiceKit.abstract: true if this environment is meant for production use cases.

Structs/Environment/Process.html.name: Process
Structs/Environment/Process.html.abstract: The process information of an environment. Wraps ProcessInto.processInfo.

Structs/Environment.html.name: Environment
Structs/Environment.html.abstract: The environment the application is running in, i.e., production, dev, etc. All Container‘s will have

Structs/Services.html.name: Services
Structs/Services.html.abstract: The Services struct is used for registering and storing a Container‘s services.

Structs/Extend.html.name: Extend
Structs/Extend.html.abstract: A wrapper around a simple [String: Any] storage dictionary used to implement Extendable.

Protocols/Provider.html#/s:10ServiceKit8.name: register(_:)
Protocols/Provider.html#/s:10ServiceKit8.abstract: Register all services you would like to provide the Container here.

Protocols/Provider.html#/s:10ServiceKit8.name: willBoot(_:)
Protocols/Provider.html#/s:10ServiceKit8.abstract: Called before the container has fully initialized.

Protocols/Provider.html#/s:10ServiceKit8.name: didBoot(_:)
Protocols/Provider.html#/s:10ServiceKit8.abstract: Called after the container has fully initialized and after willBoot(_:).

Protocols/Provider.html.name: Provider
Protocols/Provider.html.abstract: Providers allow third-party services to be easily integrated into a service Container.

Protocols/Extendable.html.name: Extendable
Protocols/Extendable.html.abstract: Types conforming to Extendable can have stored properties added in extension by using the Extend struct.

Classes/Container.html#/s:10ServiceKit9C.name: env
Classes/Container.html#/s:10ServiceKit9C.abstract: Service Environment (e.g., production, dev). Use this to dynamically swap services based on environment.

Classes/Container.html#/s:10ServiceKit9C.name: services
Classes/Container.html#/s:10ServiceKit9C.abstract: Available services. This struct contains all of this Container‘s available service implementations.

Classes/Container.html#/s:10ServiceKit9C.name: providers
Classes/Container.html#/s:10ServiceKit9C.abstract: All Providers that have been registered to this Container‘s Services.

Classes/Container.html#/s:10ServiceKit9C.name: make(_:)
Classes/Container.html#/s:10ServiceKit9C.abstract: Creates a service for the supplied interface or type.
